00010 using namespace Ogre;
00011  
00012 class KeyboardTestListener : public FrameListener
00013 {
00014 public:
00015     KeyboardTestListener(OIS::Keyboard *keyboard, SceneManager *mgr, Camera *cam)
00016         : m_Keyboard(keyboard), m_rotateNode(mgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode()), m_cam(cam), 
00017         m_camHeight(0), m_camOffset(0), m_arena(5000), m_mgr(mgr),
00018         m_thirdPersonCam(true), m_renderModel(m_arena, m_mgr)
00019     {
00020         m_cam->setFarClipDistance(0);
00021 
00022         // Generate the keyboard testing entity and attach it to the listener's scene node
00023         PlayerShip playerShip = PlayerShip(1, Vector3(0, -2000, 0));
00024         PlayerShip * p_playerShip = m_arena.addShip(playerShip);
00025     }
00026  
00027     bool frameStarted(const FrameEvent& evt)
00028     {
00029         // Capture the keyboard input
00030         m_Keyboard->capture();
00031         PlayerShip * playerShip = m_arena.getShips()->front();
00032 
00033         // Adjust or reset the camera modifiers
00034         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_Z)) {
00035             m_camHeight = 0;
00036             m_camOffset = 0;
00037         }
00038         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_UP)) {
00039             m_camHeight += 2;
00040         }
00041         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_DOWN)) {
00042             m_camHeight -= 2;
00043         }
00044         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_RIGHT)) {
00045             m_camOffset += 2;
00046         }
00047         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_LEFT)) {
00048             m_camOffset -= 2;
00049         }
00050         
00051         // Clear all existing forces, and add keyboard forces
00052         playerShip->clearForces();
00053         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_W)) {
00054             playerShip->pitch(Radian(2 * evt.timeSinceLastFrame));
00055         }
00056         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_S)) {
00057             playerShip->pitch(Radian(-2 * evt.timeSinceLastFrame));
00058         }
00059         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_A)) {
00060             playerShip->yaw(Radian(2 * evt.timeSinceLastFrame));
00061         }
00062         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_D)) {
00063             playerShip->yaw(Radian(-2 * evt.timeSinceLastFrame));
00064         }
00065         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_Q)) {
00066             playerShip->roll(Radian(2 * evt.timeSinceLastFrame));
00067         }
00068         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_E)) {
00069             playerShip->roll(Radian(-2 * evt.timeSinceLastFrame));
00070         }
00071 
00072         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_LCONTROL)) {
00073             playerShip->applyForce(playerShip->getVelocity().normalisedCopy() * (-1) * Vector3(1000, 1000, 1000));
00074         }
00075 
00076         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_UP)) {
00077             playerShip->applyForce(playerShip->getHeading() * Vector3(1000, 1000, 1000));
00078         }
00079         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_DOWN)) {
00080             playerShip->applyForce(playerShip->getHeading() * Vector3(-1000, -1000, -1000));
00081         }
00082 
00083         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_C)) {
00084             m_thirdPersonCam = !m_thirdPersonCam; 
00085         }
00086 
00087         // Generate projectile if required
00088         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_SPACE)) {
00089             if(playerShip->canShoot()) {
00090                 m_arena.fireProjectileFromShip(playerShip);
00091             }
00092         }
00093 
00094         // Update the position of the physics object and move the scene node
00095         m_arena.updatePhysics(evt.timeSinceLastFrame);
00096         m_renderModel.updateRenderList(evt.timeSinceLastFrame, m_cam->getOrientation());
00097 
00098         // Move the camera
00099         if(m_thirdPersonCam) {
00100             m_cam->setPosition(playerShip->getPosition() + Vector3(0, 1000, 1000));
00101             m_cam->lookAt(playerShip->getPosition());
00102         } else {
00103             m_cam->setPosition(playerShip->getPosition() + playerShip->getNormal() * 60 - playerShip->getHeading() * 160);
00104             m_cam->setOrientation(playerShip->getOrientation());
00105         }
00106 
00107         return !m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_ESCAPE);
00108     }
00109  
00110 private:
00111     OIS::Keyboard *m_Keyboard;
00112     SceneNode *m_rotateNode;
00113     Camera *m_cam;
00114     int m_camHeight;
00115     int m_camOffset;
00116     GameArena m_arena;
00117     bool m_thirdPersonCam;
00118 
00119     SceneManager * m_mgr;
00120     RenderModel m_renderModel;
00121 };

00123 class Application
00124 {
00125 public:
00126     void go()
00127     {
00128         createRoot();
00129         defineResources();
00130         setupRenderSystem();
00131         createRenderWindow();
00132         initializeResourceGroups();
00133         setupScene();
00134         setupInputSystem();
00135         createFrameListener();
00136         startRenderLoop();
00137     }
00138  
00139     ~Application()
00140     {
00141         mInputManager->destroyInputObject(mKeyboard);
00142         OIS::InputManager::destroyInputSystem(mInputManager);
00143         delete mListener;
00144         delete mRoot;
00145     }
00146  
00147 private:
00148     Root *mRoot;
00149     SceneManager* mMgr;
00150     OIS::Keyboard *mKeyboard;
00151     OIS::InputManager *mInputManager;
00152     KeyboardTestListener *mListener;
00153  
00154     void createRoot()
00155     {
00156         // Generate the OGRE Root object
00157         #ifdef _DEBUG
00158             mRoot = new Root("plugins_d.cfg");
00159         #else
00160             mRoot = new Root("plugins.cfg");
00161         #endif
00162     }
00163  
00164     void defineResources()
00165     {
00166         String secName, typeName, archName;
00167         
00168         // Load the resources.cfg resource definition file
00169         ConfigFile cf;
00170 
00171         #ifdef _DEBUG
00172             cf.load("resources_d.cfg");
00173         #else
00174             cf.load("resources.cfg");
00175         #endif
00176 
00177         // Loop through all the provided resource folders and add them
00178         // to the ResourceGroupManager
00179         ConfigFile::SectionIterator seci = cf.getSectionIterator();
00180         while (seci.hasMoreElements())  {
00181             // Loop through the provided sections
00182             secName = seci.peekNextKey();
00183             ConfigFile::SettingsMultiMap *settings = seci.getNext();
00184             ConfigFile::SettingsMultiMap::iterator i;
00185     
00186             for (i = settings->begin(); i != settings->end(); ++i) {
00187                 // Add each provided directory path to the GroupResourceManager
00188                 typeName = i->first;
00189                 archName = i->second;
00190                 ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().addResourceLocation(archName, typeName, secName);
00191             }
00192         }
00193     }
00194  
00195     void setupRenderSystem()
00196     {
00197         // Restore the last configuration settings, or provide a dialogue if no prior
00198         // settings are stored
00199         //if (!mRoot->restoreConfig() && !mRoot->showConfigDialog()) // Only show config if no existing config is found
00200         if (!mRoot->showConfigDialog()) // Always show config
00201             throw Exception(52, "User canceled the config dialog!", "Application::setupRenderSystem()");
00202     }
00203  
00204     void createRenderWindow()
00205     {
00206         // Create the render window (first parameter determines whether OGRE should generate
00207         // the render window)
00208         mRoot->initialise(true, "Ore War");
00209     }
00210  
00211     void initializeResourceGroups()
00212     {
00213         // Mipmaps setting must be set before resource groups are initialized
00214         TextureManager::getSingleton().setDefaultNumMipmaps(5);
00215         ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().initialiseAllResourceGroups();
00216     }
00217  
00218     void setupScene()
00219     {
00220         // Create the SceneManager
00221         SceneManager *mgr = mRoot->createSceneManager(ST_GENERIC, "Default SceneManager");
00222         
00223         // Create a camera
00224         Camera *cam = mgr->createCamera("Camera");
00225         cam->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,1000));
00226         cam->lookAt(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,0));
00227 
00228         // Create a viewport
00229         Viewport *vp = mRoot->getAutoCreatedWindow()->addViewport(cam);
00230         cam->setAspectRatio(Real(vp->getActualWidth()) / Real(vp->getActualHeight()));
00231 
00232         // Setup ambient light and shadows
00233         mgr->setAmbientLight(Ogre::ColourValue(0.15, 0.15, 0.3));
00234         mgr->setShadowTechnique(Ogre::SHADOWTYPE_STENCIL_MODULATIVE);
00235 
00236         // Add planes for the arena boundaries
00237         Plane plane(Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Y, 0);
00238         MeshManager::getSingleton().createPlane("starwall", Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::DEFAULT_RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME,
00239         plane, 10000, 10000, 100, 100, true, 1, 1, 1, Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Z);
00240 
00241         Ogre::Entity* wallEnt = mgr->createEntity("BottomWall", "starwall");
00242         SceneNode * wallNode = mgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00243         wallNode->attachObject(wallEnt);
00244         wallNode->setPosition(Vector3(0, -5000, 0));
00245         wallEnt->setMaterialName("Orewar/Starfield");
00246         wallEnt->setCastShadows(false);
00247 
00248         wallEnt = mgr->createEntity("TopWall", "starwall");
00249         wallNode = mgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00250         wallNode->attachObject(wallEnt);
00251         wallNode->setPosition(Vector3(0, 5000, 0));
00252         wallNode->setOrientation(Quaternion(Degree(180), Vector3::UNIT_X));
00253         wallEnt->setMaterialName("Orewar/Starfield");
00254         wallEnt->setCastShadows(false);
00255 
00256         wallEnt = mgr->createEntity("LeftWall", "starwall");
00257         wallNode = mgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00258         wallNode->attachObject(wallEnt);
00259         wallNode->setPosition(Vector3(-5000, 0, 0));
00260         wallNode->setOrientation(Quaternion(Degree(-90), Vector3::UNIT_Z));
00261         wallEnt->setMaterialName("Orewar/Starfield");
00262         wallEnt->setCastShadows(false);
00263 
00264         wallEnt = mgr->createEntity("RightWall", "starwall");
00265         wallNode = mgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00266         wallNode->attachObject(wallEnt);
00267         wallNode->setOrientation(Quaternion(Degree(90), Vector3::UNIT_Z));
00268         wallNode->setPosition(Vector3(5000, 0, 0));
00269         wallEnt->setMaterialName("Orewar/Starfield");
00270         wallEnt->setCastShadows(false);
00271 
00272         wallEnt = mgr->createEntity("FrontWall", "starwall");
00273         wallNode = mgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00274         wallNode->attachObject(wallEnt);
00275         wallNode->setPosition(Vector3(0, 0, 5000));
00276         wallNode->setOrientation(Quaternion(Degree(-90), Vector3::UNIT_X));
00277         wallEnt->setMaterialName("Orewar/Starfield");
00278         wallEnt->setCastShadows(false);
00279 
00280         wallEnt = mgr->createEntity("BackWall", "starwall");
00281         wallNode = mgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00282         wallNode->attachObject(wallEnt);
00283         wallNode->setOrientation(Quaternion(Degree(90), Vector3::UNIT_X));
00284         wallNode->setPosition(Vector3(0, 0, -5000));
00285         wallEnt->setMaterialName("Orewar/Starfield");
00286         wallEnt->setCastShadows(false);
00287 
00288 
00289         // Put a giant ship in the middle of the arena
00290         SceneNode * shipNode = mgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00291         Entity * shipEntity = mgr->createEntity("GiantShip", "RZR-002.mesh");
00292         shipEntity->setCastShadows(true);
00293         shipNode->attachObject(shipEntity);
00294         shipNode->setScale(100, 100, 100);
00295 
00296         // Add a skybox
00297         // mgr->setSkyBox(true, "Orewar/SpaceSkyBox", 20000, false);
00298     }
00299  
00300     void setupInputSystem()
00301     {
00302         // Initialize OIS
00303         size_t windowHnd = 0;
00304         std::ostringstream windowHndStr;
00305         OIS::ParamList pl;
00306         RenderWindow *win = mRoot->getAutoCreatedWindow();
00307  
00308         win->getCustomAttribute("WINDOW", &windowHnd);
00309         windowHndStr << windowHnd;
00310         pl.insert(std::make_pair(std::string("WINDOW"), windowHndStr.str()));
00311         mInputManager = OIS::InputManager::createInputSystem(pl);
00312 
00313 
00314         // Setup (Unbuffered in this case) input objects
00315         try {
00316             mKeyboard = static_cast<OIS::Keyboard*>(mInputManager->createInputObject(OIS::OISKeyboard, false));
00317             //mMouse = static_cast<OIS::Mouse*>(mInputManager->createInputObject(OIS::OISMouse, false));
00318             //mJoy = static_cast<OIS::JoyStick*>(mInputManager->createInputObject(OIS::OISJoyStick, false));
00319         }
00320         catch (const OIS::Exception &e) {
00321             throw Exception(42, e.eText, "Application::setupInputSystem");
00322         }
00323     }
00324  
00325     void createFrameListener()
00326     {
00327         // Create and add a listener for the keyboard
00328         // Note: Input devices can have only one listener
00329         mListener = new KeyboardTestListener(mKeyboard, mRoot->getSceneManager("Default SceneManager"), 
00330             mRoot->getSceneManager("Default SceneManager")->getCamera("Camera"));
00331         mRoot->addFrameListener(mListener);
00332     }
00333  
00334     void startRenderLoop()
00335     {
00336         mRoot->startRendering();
00337     }
00338 };
